synopsis: In a desperate bid to find a paper leaker, two students embark on an absurd quest. However, their plan soon takes an unexpected turn. Offering a comical blend of mystery and moral ambiguity, FMaC presents to you: 'ZEHER.'

'हर रावण की कहानी में एक चीज निश्चित है.....उसका अंत' Two college friends get involved in a crime and must safeguard themselves from legal actions. As time ticks their friendship and morality is tested uncovering some dark truths along the journey.
How far do our mistakes define us? 'sorry' explores the ugly aftermath of a broken friendship in a tale told visually. This film features original music made by members of the Filmmaking Club.
